name: Equipment Expense Report
query:
select jc.equipment_number, jc.equipment_type, sum(jc.goods_amount), sum(jc.services_amount), jc.name, jc.customer , 
ss.leave_encashment_amount, ss.gross_pay , tc.total_claim_amount, 
case st.eligible_for_deputation
when 1
then (st.deputation/100)*st.net_pay 
else 0
end as dep 
from  `tabSalary Slip` as ss, `tabJob Card` jc, `tabTravel Claim` tc, `tabSalary Structure` as st, `tabEquipment` e 
where jc.equipment_number  in (select e.equipment_number from `tabEquipment` e where e.current_operator = ss.employee)
and ss.employee = st.employee and st.employee = tc.employee
group by jc.equipment_number
